SELECT T.DAILY_NO AS "DAILY_NO" , DAILY_IMG , COUNT(L.DAILY_NO) AS "COUNT" FROM ( SELECT * FROM THEME_POST WHERE THEME_NO = ? ) T LEFT JOIN DAILY D ON(T.DAILY_NO = D.DAILY_NO) LEFT JOIN DAILY_LIKE L ON(T.DAILY_NO = L.DAILY_NO) GROUP BY T.DAILY_NO, DAILY_IMG ORDER BY COUNT DESC
SELECT DAILY_NO , DAILY_IMG FROM THEME_POST JOIN DAILY USING(DAILY_NO) WHERE THEME_NO = ?
SELECT THEME_NO , THEME_TITLE , THEME_TITLE_COLOR , THEME_SUBTITLE FROM THEME WHERE STATUS = 'Y' AND THEME_TITLE NOT LIKE 'Monthly%'
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT DAILY_NO , DAILY_IMG FROM THEME_POST JOIN DAILY USING (DAILY_NO) WHERE THEME_NO = ? AND DAILY_NO != ? ORDER BY DBMS_RANDOM.VALUE) WHERE ROWNUM <= 4
